blocks: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="loop" id="sXETw)YE%4vi{8pDbkcM" deletable="false" x="0" y="0"><statement name="CONTENT"><block type="controls_whileUntil" id="#/]!hO[UX-Q]|%JR+RQ;"><field name="MODE">WHILE</field><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_compare" id="(Mt(!I:HI3^yC$+kg${+"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="step" id="E3AnIS=jEzQ*.smPjWxz"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" use-return="true"></mutation><field name="COMPLEMENT">FORWARD</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number" id="B[}V5N|-Hz.a=h;u7KDJ"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="turnangle" id="A7ugxURq./+ys7HbZ4~l"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" operation="TURN" use-return="false"></mutation><field name="COMPLEMENT">TURN</field><value name="ANGLE"><shadow type="math_number" id="/n!m^V@bJIx/=F$^a5Yq"><field name="NUM">180</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></statement></block></xml>
explain: No exemplo o gladiador se move para frente até que encontre algum obstáculo, então rotaciona 180 graus no sentido horário. Este comportamento repetitivo fará com que o gladiador execute uma trajetória de vai-e-vem pela arena.
